abstract.text: Controls the transition progress between the image variants of fill-pattern. Zero means the first variant is used, one is the second, and in between they are blended together. Both images should be the same size and have the same type (either raster or vector).
Default value: 0. Value range: [0, 1]

Specifies an uniform elevation in meters. Note: If the value is zero, the layer will be rendered on the ground. Non-zero values will elevate the layer from the sea level, which can cause it to be rendered below the terrain.
Default value: 0. Minimum value: 0.
